Project: E-commerce Product Scraper
âœ… Project Name

E-commerce Product Scraper

ğŸ“– Description

This project scrapes product details (name, price, rating, link, etc.) from Flipkart/Amazon using Python Requests + BeautifulSoup.
It allows users to input a search query (e.g., "laptop", "mobile"), fetch product listings, and display the results.

ğŸ› ï¸ Tools / Concepts Used

Python

Requests (for fetching HTML pages)

BeautifulSoup (bs4) (for parsing HTML)

File Handling (CSV export)

Exception Handling
